{{Infobox Berry |name = #58 Kee |image = [[File:Kee.png]] |caption = This Berry remains poisonous until fully ripened. Once ripe it has a spicy and sweet complex flavor. |growtime = 10h 6m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.03% |points = 3000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Kee''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Liechi]] and at least 1 [[Ganlon]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 18 mins || 2 hours 36 mins || 5 hours 6 mins || 10 hours 6 mins - 20 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 10 hours 6 mins -
20 hours 12 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 6 hours 44 mins -
13 hours 28 mins || 81 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 hours 29 mins 20 secs -
8 hours 58 mins 40 secs || 54 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Kee_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Kee berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Liechi]] || - || - || - |- | [[Ganlon]] || - || - || - |} Note: Ganlon and Liechi berries have equivalent growth times. {{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]
